reviewText: If you like road racing, if you like motorcycles and if you like the TT and the North West 200 this is a MUST watch, what a great documentary... I spent an hour and a half in front of the screen being too damn excited, happy and sad. Great great watch.

Incredible movie!! Joey and Robert died doing what they love- to them not racing was death.  I feel for the remaining family members the sons the mother and wives.  As a rider myself when i'm on the road i don't think about the risks if i go down or get injured you just don't think about it because you just ride
I would recommend this film to anyone who has an appreciation for motorsports. This copy would not play in a US version Playstation2, it worked in my dvd player.

This is a Wonderful Movie involving a great family with great friends and great relations.  There will never be a greater heritage in Motorcycle racing than the Dunlops.  This movie for me shows there's no greater bearing on life than the present.  No past, no future, just tears streaming down your face in the moment.  Ride safe.
Plays in all of my DVD players. Great documentary.
